product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Camp Cot - Large - Special Buy
long_description: Adventure is awesome, but it can be exhausting. Get a good night's rest with the sturdy, stable ALPS Mountaineering Camp Cot. Powder-coated aluminum frame is reinforced with steel connectors and covered with 600-denier polyester fabric. Side storage pocket stows glasses, keys and a flashlight. Cot measures 82 x 32 in. Folds up into a 41 x 8 x 5 in. carry/storage bag. Special buy.
short_description: Adventure is awesome, but it can be exhausting. Get a good night's rest with the sturdy, stable ALPS Mountaineering Camp Cot.
